General.Name: Chang Type Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: CHANG TYPE Industrial Co., Ltd. researches for, develops, manufactures, and sells hand tools, electrical and computer machinery, motors, electric tools, automatic control systems, and electrical testing instruments in China and the United States. It also involved in the manufacturing, processing, and trading of woodworking machinery and hardware parts, as well as the import and export trade of raw materials related to the products; designs molds and fixtures. In addition, the company offers miter, scroll, radial arm, and band saw products. It serves original equipment manufacturers and original design manufacturers. CHANG TYPE Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
